name: My Life Is Cactus
description:
GOAL : Plant your own cactus and upgrade them to survive from the zombies.

3 primary upgrades of cactus : 

- Heal : to regenerate your character.

- Attack : to shoot zombies.

- Collect : to give more heal when collecting.

Controls : 

- MOVE : WASD, ZQSD or left joystick.

- Plant or Collect : left clic or left trigger.

- Upgrade : right clic or right trigger.

- Choose upgrade : WASD, ZQSD or ABXY.

Credits :

Jules Persch (@Aqshy33) : Game Programmer.

Axel Denjean (MrBrooms) : Game Designer.

Corentin Lange : Musician & Sound Designer.

Game made with Unreal Engine 4. We don't have made the 3D models and textures , we used free assets given by Epic Games and Zombie of Mixamo.

Update is here !!!  05/01/2019.
